foreignData.name: Heimkehr // Heimzahlung
foreignData.text: Verdopple deinen Lebenspunktestand. Ein Gegner deiner Wahl verliert die Hälfte seiner Lebenspunkte, aufgerundet.

foreignData.name: Resurgimiento // Revancha
foreignData.text: Duplica tu total de vidas. El oponente objetivo pierde la mitad de sus vidas, redondeando hacia arriba.

foreignData.name: Revif // Rétorsion
foreignData.text: Doublez votre total de points de vie. L'adversaire ciblé perd la moitié de ses points de vie, arrondie à l'unité supérieure.

foreignData.name: Ridestare // Ripicca
foreignData.text: Raddoppia i tuoi punti vita. Un avversario bersaglio perde metà dei suoi punti vita, arrotondati per eccesso.

foreignData.name: 回生 // 会稽
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。あなたのライフ総量を２倍にする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライフの端数を切り上げた半分の点数のライフを失う。

foreignData.name: 부활 // 복수
foreignData.text: 당신의 생명 총점을 두 배로 한다. 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 자신의 생명점의 절반을 반올림한 만큼 생명점을 잃는다.

foreignData.name: Revitalização // Revanche
foreignData.text: Dobre seu total de pontos de vida. O oponente alvo perde metade do próprio total de pontos de vida, arredondado para cima.

foreignData.name: Возрождение // Возмездие
foreignData.text: Удвойте ваше количество жизней. Целевой оппонент теряет половину своих жизней с округлением в большую сторону.

foreignData.name: 再生 // 再战
foreignData.text: 将你的总生命加倍。目标对手失去一半生命，小数点后进位。

foreignData.name: 再生 // 再戰
foreignData.text: 將你的總生命加倍。目標對手失去一半生命，小數點後進位。

name: Revival // Revenge
originalText: Double your life total. Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

rulings.text: If a card in a graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

To double a player’s life total, that player gains as much life as needed so that their life total is twice the number it was before. If their life total was negative, that player loses as much life as needed so that their life total is twice as far below 0 as it was before. Other effects interact with this life gain or loss accordingly.

text: Double your life total. Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.
